com.intel.icecp.node.channels.file

Class FileChannel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intel.icecp.core.channels.ChannelBase
      • com.intel.icecp.node.channels.file.FileChannel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Channel, EventObservable, AutoCloseable

    public class FileChannel
extends ChannelBase
    A channel for retrieving file data and subscribing to file changes. Uses Java NIO to watch the file; each file modification will bump the channel version. TODO perhaps implement versioning of some sort, e.g. file.0, file.1...

    • Method Detail

      • open

        public CompletableFuture<Void> open()
                             throws ChannelLifetimeException
        This open() method initializes the file for this channel. If the file is on the local file system, or if the file is in the jar file it does the right thing. This method does not need to be called by the user, since it is called for you in subscribe(), publish, and getLastMessage().
        Returns:
        Throws:
        ChannelLifetimeException

      • close

        public void close()
           throws ChannelLifetimeException
        Throws:
        ChannelLifetimeException

      • createFileSyStem

        public Path createFileSyStem()
                      throws ChannelLifetimeException
        Try the local file system first to create and store the path; if the path doesn't exist, we assume its trying to pull the file from a JAR file. So first we need to create the file system and then the path.
        Returns:
        the Path to the file to monitor
        Throws:
        ChannelLifetimeException - if the file system cannot be created

      • subscribe

        public void subscribe(OnPublish callback)
               throws ChannelIOException
        Subscribe to changes to the underlying file; uses Java NIO WatchService in a separate thread to wait for changes. TODO use EventLoop instead of separate thread?
        Parameters:
        callback - a callback method to receive the changed file bytes.
        Throws:
        ChannelIOException

      • latest

        public CompletableFuture<Message> latest()
                                  throws ChannelIOException
        Retrieve a future file; file access will not occur until Future.get() is called.
        Returns:
        a Future to the latest available representation of the file
        Throws:
        ChannelIOException

      • publish

        public void publish(Message message)
             throws ChannelIOException
        Over-writes the file with the serialized message.
        Throws:
        ChannelIOException
